meanings.definition: The presence of glandular tissue in a part of the body where it is not normally found.
meanings.sent1: The adenosis in her lungs was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: Doctors discovered adenosis in her breast during a routine check-up.
meanings.sent3: The adenosis in his toe made him the subject of medical curiosity.
meanings.sent4: Her adenosis was like a hidden treasure waiting to be uncovered.
meanings.sent5: The adenosis in her body was like a secret garden flourishing in an unexpected place.

meanings.definition: A benign condition characterized by an increase in the number of glandular cells in a tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that her breast adenosis was harmless.
meanings.sent2: Adenosis in the skin can sometimes cause minor discomfort.
meanings.sent3: His adenosis was so mild that it almost seemed like a friendly visitor.
meanings.sent4: The adenosis in the tissue multiplied like a peaceful colony.
meanings.sent5: The adenosis spread slowly, like a gentle wave washing over the tissue.
